title: AMA#1 - Kain Warwick of Synthetix
description:
Kain Warwick, Founder of the Synthetix Platform, presents himself to the Bankless Nation for a live AMA!

We ask him anything! No question off limits.Â 

This is a BONUS episode. Regular podcast episode (#26) will be released tomorrow.

-----

ğŸ§™â€â™€ï¸Â POLYMARKET - BET ON CRYPTOÂ - bet your beliefs! -Â use it to bet on DeFi outcomes!Â 

ğŸŒˆÂ AAVE - LEND & BORROW YOUR CRYPTO W/O A BANKÂ - earn some interest!

ğŸ’¸Â AMPLFORTH -Â MONETARY EXPERIMENT FOR BASE MONEYÂ - learn about this experiment!

-----

We do AMAs every 2nd and 4th Thursday of the month.Â 

Become a Bankless member to get access to the Zoom Webinar and ask questions to future AMA guests like Kain directly!

Here's the video recording.Â 

Kain is the founder of Snythetix, a popular synthetics and derivatives market on Ethereum. The Bankless Nation asks him questions about:

  1. High gas fees
  2. yams lol
  3. Yield farming
  4. Future vision for synthetics
  5. DeF in a Layer 2
  6. Central bank digital currencies
  7. The final boss
  8. Eth2
  9. What he learned from 2017
  10. Bull market price predictions!

And more....

-----
